slippage.title: Swap Slippage
slippage.caption: Slippage on swaps is the difference between expected and executed trade prices.

warning.title: High Slippage
warning.text: Having high slippage on swaps can result in substantially lower returns. Please read up on slippage for AMM orders before you continue.

blocklist.title: Enabled Protocols
blocklist.caption: A disabled DEX won't be used for swaps

aggregators.title: Enabled Aggregators
aggregators.caption: Disabled aggregators will not be used for swaps
